item.title: TIL 05.03.2017
item.description: SMS Length What is the max length of an SMS? max SMS length is 1120 bit 7 bit per character used for default alphabet means max length is 160 characters ( 1120 / 7 ) 8 bit is used for data-messages ( e.g. images or sound messages ) 16 bit per character for the rest of the characters using Unicode encoding, meaning max 70 characters. 1 Note: German Umlaute ( ö, ü, ä ) use 16bit per characters Note: If one character needs to be encoded with 16bit, then the whole message is encoded with 16bit.
